string-array.name: exercisesText
string-array.item: 1. Lie flat on your back on a bench. 2 Grip the bar with hands 3. Bring the bar slowly down. Push up as you breathe out.
1. Stand straight. 2. Lower down. 3. Straighten your legs to lift back.
1. Bend over and grab the bar. 2. Lift your chest up. 3. Stand up with the weight.
